short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates more accurate random pax number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates more accurate random pax number, it adds it automatically to Vamsys passenger number on the booking page. If you want to regenerate the number there is a new button in the booking screen for that
